text: Nihsandeha ahale kitabamadhye kehi yasta pani chan, jo ki allahamathi ra tyasamathi juna timila'i pradana gari'eko cha, ra tyasamathi juna tiniharula'i pradana gari'eko cha, astha rakhdachan ra allahako agadi natamastaka hunchan ra allahako ayatala'i sano tino mulyama becdainan. Yasta manisaharuko pratiphala allahakaham tayara cha ra allahale sighra hisaba linevala cha
